children.html:
GRIS has finally released on the Nintendo Switch and if you’ve read our review and are still not convinced, why not watch the first 30 minutes of the game?

 

Will you be picking up GRIS? Let us know in the Comments section below.

Be sure to like us on Facebook in order to get updated with every article we post, along with more Nintendo content. And hey if you enjoyed this, why not check out the first 30 minutes of Monster Boy and the Cursed Kingdom?
